reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that they may collect, store, use, and share personal information when using their services.
reply.reference: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on the Services, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and Services, when you participate in activities on the Services, or otherwise when you contact us. URL: https://metacognium.com/App_privacy_policy/

Engage with us in other related ways, including any sales, marketing, or events

- HOW CAN YOU CONTACT US ABOUT THIS NOTICE?

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects names, email addresses, passwords, and application data which may include push notifications.

reply.analysis: Based on the identified context, the app collects various types of data including user names, email addresses, passwords, and application-related data such as push notifications.
reply.reference: names, email addresses, passwords, Push Notifications, URL: https://metacognium.com/App_privacy_policy/

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that personal information is collected for various reasons like account creation, to offer support, send administrative information, fulfill orders, and protect individuals' vital interests. These purposes are declared in the document.
reply.reference: The personal information we collect may include the following: names, email addresses, passwords. Application Data. If you use our application(s), we also may collect the following information if you choose to provide us with access or permission. Push Notifications. We may request to send you push notifications regarding your account or certain features of the application(s). This information is primarily needed for the security and operation of our application(s) and for our internal analytics and reporting purposes. URL: https://metacognium.com/App_privacy_policy/

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data. The user may request to opt out from future selling of personal information to third parties, and upon receiving such a request, the company will act upon it as soon as feasibly possible.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users have the option to opt out of data collection or request the deletion of their data, specifically mentioning the ability to opt out from selling personal information to third parties.
reply.reference: You may request to opt out from future selling of your personal information to third parties. Upon receiving an opt-out request, we will act upon the request as soon as feasibly possible, but no later than fifteen (15) days from the date of the request submission. URL: https://metacognium.com/App_privacy_policy/

8. WHAT ARE YOUR PRIVACY RIGHTS?
In some regions (like the EEA, UK, and Canada), you have certain rights under applicable data protection laws. These may include the right (i) to request access and obtain a copy of your personal information, (ii) to request rectification or erasure; (iii) to restrict the processing of your personal information; and (iv) if applicable, to data portability. In certain circumstances, you may also have the right to object ...
